body: Hello, Im ThugLife0nly1996 and I've been having issues with getting in game. I play on a MacBook Pro 15.6 Inch 2016; Processor 2.6GHz; Intel Core i7; macOS Sierra; Version 10.12.6. My connection runs on 30 mbps and a consistent 59 ms in game. After champion select when the client transitions into loading screen with the champion cards my screen turns white. It proceeds to inform me to retry to connect or cancel. After repeated attempts to reconnect I close the client. Granted this problem happens occasionally, I haven't been able to relieve these 20 min queues because of the reoccurring " Away From Keyboard " due to not being able to reconnect. I have done some research i.e. reviewing different forums and eventually discovering that other Mac Users have been dealing with this same problem. It seems for most Mac users the issues range from weak processors to old versions of make that aren't compatible or suited for League of Legends, but for most Mac users it seems there is a problem with the new patches in the 7.1. Please help!{{champion:245}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3100}}

replies.body: League is always online and Mac users most often experience connection issues when running into problems.  Your specific issue sounds like your network is having some problems reaching the game server, and getting those errors and white screen.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide offers Mac steps that should fix this up!
Try hex tech tool and did not work. Its definitely not a connection issue because I haven't had problems with other games and my ping stay consistently good.
Thanks for nothing also no reply from riot support.

Hey, I'm super sorry about the delay in responding.  It sucks that the connection guide didn't work in this case, but we can dig a bit deeper.  Use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can continue working with you directly to figure this out!
